author: Special Correspondent
text:
Even as the second tourist season in Udhagamandalam, the Queen of hill stations, is coming to a close, the temperature has dipped to 1 degree Celsius on Sunday night. The temperature was recorded the Botanical Gardens.

The maximum temperature on January 4 stood at 20 degree Celsius. This had been the lowest temperature this winter. Last December saw the temperature dip to 9.5 degree Celsius.

On Saturday the temperature had dipped to 4 degree Celsius. The humidity level stood at 46 per cent.

Bonfires have become common at public places, and at houses with the dip in temperature.

The Botanical Garden has activated its popup sprinklers to wash off the dew from the grass before the sun rise to prevent the frost from damaging the lawns.
title: Queen freezes, as temperature dips
